lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson each shot a three-under-par 69 at the P.G.A. Championship, placing them three shots off a lead shared by Lucas Glover and Chris Riley.
snippet: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson each shot a three-under-par 69 at the P.G.A. Championship, placing them three shots off a lead shared by Lucas Glover and Chris Riley.
